record.title: EXECUTIVE SESSION

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to executive session to consider Executive Calendar Nos. 115, 153, 164, 166 through 205 and 207 through 229; and all nominations on the Secretary's desk; that the nominations be confirmed; the motions to reconsider be laid upon the table; the President be immediately notified of the Senate's action and the Senate then return to legislative session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
